name: Free Bubbles
description:
Want to have fun in your free time? Download the awesome Free Bubbles game and hop on the adventure! Careful, it's addictive - Free Bubbles game might take all of your free time!

Play this fun free game now and discover thousands of challenging levels with lots of fun missions, puzzles, and boosts that make this game one of a kind. Grab this awesome bubble shooter game from the play store and feel the freedom to pop and blast all bubbles.

Hit and explode all the colorful balloons to win coins and unlock new exciting levels.
Try out this awesome game and explore plenty of exciting levels packed with fun challenges and puzzles that will keep you engaged for hours. Start playing today!

GAME FEATURES
* Classic and most addictive game mode. Pop bubbles and win!
* Thousands of challenging puzzle levels.
* Free bubble swap! Change colors and pop bubbles.
* Powerful boosters that will help you hit and shoot all the balls.
* Fun free game. Play & enjoy this free bubble shooter game with family and friends.
* Play offline! No wifi or internet connection is needed!

Experience this free bubble shooter game where you have to make combinations of 3 or more colored balls to blast them away and win points. Your goal is to clear all the bubbles from the board to level up and reveal the next exciting challenge!
AWESOME BOOSTS
Reach high scores and earn powerful boosters that will help you blast your way through the tricky puzzles and become the undefeatable bubble shooter champion.
* Drop 10 bubbles in a single shot to get a bomb that will take out the surrounding bubbles.
* Pop 7 bubbles in a row and to get a fireball that will cut through a pass.


Shoot and explode the balloons, reveal new levels and discover awesome puzzles for the whole family to enjoy. Pop every bubble with as few shots as possible to reach high scores and get three stars on every level. Get this bubble shooter game now and experience easy and fun gameplay, tap on the screen to shoot balls, unlock amazing boosts and plan your moves to finish levels. Play through thousands of thrilling levels and enjoy the most amazing gameplay anywhere and anytime!

FUN & OFFLINE FREE GAME!
Put your strategy and matching skills to the test in this exciting bubble popping adventure. This free bubble shooter game offers some fun puzzles and brain teasers, cool effects and amazing boosts. Hurry up and join the balloon popping mania, pop bubbles, and clear levels.

Play and enjoy Free Bubbles game and experience hour of fun- all for FREE!


All rights of Bubble Shooter™ are owned by Ilyon Dynamics Ltd.
